text: <@U0U9WJB7F> <@U0HP6TFNX> - would you mind taking a look at Scott’s email re: the discovery icons and working with melodee to come up with a solution that fits what he’s looking for? I am hoping to go heads down on some chameleon stuff today and monday.
<@U0HP6TFNX> just realized you might be off today, it’s not super urgent.
I'm in the office today. Will take a look
ok thanks
for sure, thanks <@U0260V1BX>

<@U0U9WJB7F> <@U026103R3> for our next meeting with scott i’d like to add an agenda item: Chameleon patterns. Uncorked won’t be designing the UI for chameleon but I want to make sure there is consistency and oversight from a pattern perspective. I want to know what Scott’s thoughts are on how our activity pattern might live on Chameleon, or what opportunity there might be for Uncorked to design some patterns that are optimized for Chameleon (maybe your purchase can unlock some Chameleon-owners-only patterns on Compass?) Quinn and I are advocating hard the activity pattern to have a pretty central role on Chameleon.

Ok thanks for the head’s up Melissa. I will create an agenda now and add it. Also I’d like to be able to show Scott some follow up to the Discovery icon exploration at that Tuesday 4pm meeting. So head’s up <@U0MKH0BE0> <@U0HP6TFNX> on that front. <@U0260V1BX> I also want to make sure you’re in the loop on that and can help out when chameleon isn’t on fire.

<@U0260V1BX> we had a chat over Scott’s email, and it sounds like he wants to make sure we consistently reinforce the relationship between icons and discoveries, especially being mindful of the potential confusion around abstract home screen activity icons
which was a roundabout way of saying, I think our first exploration, with pillar icons on discoveries on the home screen tile, is what scott’s talking about

we revisited the original home screen tiles that got us poking at the potential visual clutter on these tiles, and we’re thinking that it comes down to actual photo content. The photos that don’t show well with the icons overlaid are also problematic for the white text, so we just need good photo selection to avoid the issue
So we’d like to share Melodee’s first exploration with Scott. Wanted to make sure you’re  on board with all that before I reply to his email
that all sounds good. thanks <@U0HP6TFNX>!

<@U0MKH0BE0> can you make sure jenna and i get the link to that exploration if/when it’s ready to share? i’ll need to get ahead of the scoping side of the conversation with Israel to see if we can add these in for 1.0 depending on how things go with Scott.
<https://www.dropbox.com/sh/p94w2ffenuc1ru2/AACe-4xx_cjVC5PDj5p67r9Ha?dl=0>
all ready
^thank you <@U0MKH0BE0>
:+1::skin-tone-5:
I was going to copy <@U026103R3>
and jenna, so you both can be looped into the email
yessss thank you
k
:slightly_smiling_face:
perfect, thanks all around!

<!channel> just got the final icon files from scott and any guidelines. His note "Guidelines for visual weighting below,noted, it is not a complete science, but this is more clear direction on treatment for use and then spec'ing for development.”
